TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AvailableProviderOperationDisplay extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Contains the localized display information for this particular operation/action. These value will be used by several clients for (a) custom role definitions for RBAC, (b) complex query filters for the event service and (c) audit history/records for management operations.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the AvailableProviderOperationDisplay class.

MemberSignature.Value: public AvailableProviderOperationDisplay (string provider = null, string resource = null, string operation = null, string description = null);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string provider, string resource, string operation, string description) cil managed
Public Sub New (Optional provider As String = null, Optional resource As String = null, Optional operation As String = null, Optional description As String = null)
AvailableProviderOperationDisplay(std::wstring const & provider = null, std::wstring const & resource = null, std::wstring const & operation = null, std::wstring const & description = null);

Docs.param: The localized friendly form of the resource provider name - it is expected to also include the publisher/company responsible. It should use Title Casing and begin with 'Microsoft' for 1st party services.

The localized friendly form of the resource type related to this action/operation - it should match the public documentation for the resource provider. It should use Title Casing - for examples, please refer to the 'name' section.

The localized friendly name for the operation, as it should be shown to the user. It should be concise (to fit in drop downs) but clear (i.e. self-documenting). It should use Title Casing and include the entity/resource to which it applies.
The localized friendly description for the operation, as it should be shown to the user. It should be thorough, yet concise - it will be used in tool tips and detailed views.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the AvailableProviderOperationDisplay class.
